reviews.comments: El lugar es muy tranquilo y cerca de los centros comerciales, Ralph muy buen anfitrión,  muy amable y servicial, dispuesto a ayudar en cada momento y dar las explicaciones justas. El departamento tenía algunos detalles como diferentes cables para cargar celulares, adaptadores. Así también como posee pileta tenía todo el equipo indispensable para concurrir a la misma, sombreros, toallas, pareos.  La cocina estaba muy bien equipada

Es un departamento , con exelente vistas , limpieza , calidad , muy practico , todo espectacular, la atencion por parte de Marcelo un diez , muy correcto y confiable , lo recomiendo 100 x 100  , abrazo grande a todos el equipo de Ralf .

Ralf y su equipo son excelentes anfitriones y por sobretodo excelente personas. Hicieron todo lo posible para que nuestra estadía en la ciudad fuera de lo más grato, incluso modificando en lo posible el horario del check in y el check out. 

El departamento es un lujo con todo su mobiliario nuevo casi a estrenar, con una vista impresionante de la ciudad, el edificio es de los más lindos que he visitado en Buenos Aires (incluyendo Puerto Madero), la zona es de lo más cómoda y segura, a escasos metros se encuentra Av. Santa Fe con dos paradas importantes del subte, existen muchas opciones tanto para desayuno como de almuerzo y cena en la zona y a pocas cuadras.

Sin duda volvería a hospedarme en el departamento de Ralf.

El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, impecable y  funcional. La vista desde el piso 20 es espectacular. Tiene un balconcito hermoso para sentarse a desayunar o tomar una copa por la noche. 
A diferencia de otros departamentos que uno encuentra en Airbnb, este cuenta con todos los detalles necesarios que un buen hotel ofrece y más. Es ideal para personas detallistas y exigentes que buscan un ambiente que los haga sentir como en casa. 

Volveré a hospedarme aquí, cuando visite BA sin duda alguna.
Todo según lo acordado. El departamento muy bien ambientado. El edificio moderno y con todas las comodidades!

realmente es muy bueno y limpio el departamento , buena vista y ubicación, super gentiles todos los del TEAM, sobre todo Marcelo.
lo recomiendo muchísimo sin limite.

Hemos tenido la suerte de haber estado en tan hermoso departamento,cuidado en el mínimo detalle;todo excelente, la vista estupenda,el interior un lujo,hay todo lo que uno necesita para disfrutar de una estadia en Buenos Aires, cerca de todo,la zona fabulosa. Nos ha recibido Marcelo,una persona estupenda, nos ha explicado cada detalle de la casa, tips, nos ha dejado una tarjeta para poder usar los medios publicos,nos recibio con frutas y bebidas, el gimnasio y la vista desde el piso 31 increiblemente (URL HIDDEN) parte de seguridad 24 horas, y encima la puerta del departamento blindada. Como hemos llegado de noche nos han enviado un auto a buscarnos a (URL HIDDEN) experiencia fue 10 puntos,excelente!!!!! Super Host!!!!!
reviews.response: Gracias Gabriela, será un placer hospedarlos nuevamente. Me alegro que que hayan disfrutado del apt!

reviews.comments: Excelente departamento! La mejor ubicación, a pasos del subte (linea D) y cerca de los mejores lugares de Palermo Soho.  Cómodo, limpio y con todo lo necesario para tener una gran estadía. Siempre elijo quedarme en los departamentos de Ralf asi que volveré en la próxima ocasión.  Super recomendable!

El departamento cumplió con todas las expectativas, las fotos corresponden a la realidad, la localización del edificio en relación con el transporte es muy buena y la vista que tiene es maravillosa.
Una excelente estadía.

Marcelo nos recibió muy bien. Nos explicó todo lo concerniente al departamento y hasta nos dejó hacer un late check out, lo cual agradecimos mucho porque estábamos con un bebe. La descripción y fotos coincidían exactamente con el departamento. Una gran sensación de seguridad debido a las medidas del edificio. Muy bueno el detalle de las frutas y el agua. Excelente experiencia.

El estudio es tal y como aparece en las fotos. Las vistas hacia la ciudad son buenas, pero desde el gimnasio del último piso son espectaculares. El barrio es maravilloso: hermoso, seguro, bien comunicado y con un montón de restaurantes cerca. El aeropuerto Aeroparque está a menos de 15 minutos en taxi. El propietario ha confeccionado una magnífica lista de restaurantes recomendados, probamos tres de ellos y cada cual era mejor. El estudio es muy confortable para una pareja y aunque hay estrictas normas de seguridad para acceder al edificio, están permitidas las visitas sin problema. El chico que nos recibió fue puntual, amable y nos explicó todo lo necesario. Limpieza perfecta. Cocina totalmente equipada.
todo muy bien ,buen anfitrion,lindo dpto, bien cuidado,ubicacion  exelente

El apartamento se ve tal cual las fotos, limpio y prolijo. La atención fue muy buena,  cordial y puntual (llegamos 11.15 PM aprox.).  El gimnasio en el piso 31 tiene 1 cinta para correr, 2 bicicletas fijas, 1 escalador, 1 cama de pilates,  con una vista espectacular. Esta a 2 cuadras del metro con muy buen transporte colectivo. A unas 6/7 cuadras de la zona de restaurantes de Palermo Soho. El anfitrion fue muy amable al dejar bebidas frias, frutas y galletitas para nuestro arribo. En resumen una opción muy recomendable.
Fantastica experiencia. De los 3 departamentos que use en las pasadas 4 semanas este fue el mejor. Super organizado y con detalles en la llegada que me sorprendieron gratamente.
El apartamento muy bien, muy funcional todo. Muy práctico. Recomendable.

Tuvimos una excelente estadía en el apartamento de Ralf! Es igual que en las fotos, la vista es maravillosa! Cuenta con todo lo necesario.
Es mi tercera vez arrendando uno de los apartamentos de Ralf y el servicio siempre es inmejorable. Seguiré llegando cada vez que vuelva a Buenos Aires.

Excelente departamento, completamente equipado y una vista excepcional. La ubicación es una de las mejores en un edificio moderno y seguro. Un departamento con lindo diseño (tal cual como se ve en las fotos) y tranquilo, sin ruidos de la calle dada su orientación y altura. El recibimiento del anfitrion también fuy muy bueno, siendo puntual y preciso respecto al funcionamiento del departamento y las condiciones del arriendo. Recomiendo este departamento y tambíen a la empresa encargada la cual posee mas propiedades.

Muy buena ubicación, a una cuadra de Av Santa Fé, cercano a Palermo Soho (10 minutos a pie), con los mejores restaurantes, pubs y tiendas de ropa. La mejor onda!

El apartamento es tal cual sale en las fotos, con una linda terraza con vista despejada. 

El gym del piso 31 es genial, con las mejores vistas de Bs As.

Lo recomiendo.

Me encanto el departamento,se encuentra muy bien ubicado en (URL HIDDEN) visata por la mañana y la tarde son espectaculares ,tiene todo lo necesario para unos buenos días en buenos (URL HIDDEN) para 2 personas máximo ya que no es muy grande ,pero esta bien.Cuenta por piscina ,lo que lo hace muy bueno para esos días de calor.Los anfitriones se tomaron el tiempo necesario conmigo.Lo recomiendo
El departamento esta muy bien decorado y tiene todo lo necesario para vivir unos días en Baires. Gracias a todo el equipo por su atención permanente y su profesionalidad.

It's a great place to stay !
Location, apartment equipment, view etc ! Recomended 100%

Absolutely perfect place for our week in BA.  It is safe, secure and in the best location for Palermo (soho or Hollywood) and is very close to the metro.  The facilities and support is superb.  If you are in any doubt book it - you won’t be disappointed.
Amazing stay at this apartment. Everything from check in to check out was amazing. Also the security and location can not be beat. There is no better place in Palermo!
Loved the place, the view, the small touches that make it an experience rather than just a stay. Very professional, will stay whenever I’m in Palermo.
Everything about this apt is great. Marcelo took the time to explain everything clearly. The view is incredible and the apt was luxe and comfortable.

Ralf's apartment was very well kept and maintained, nice kitchen and beautiful view. The location was central and located near the train. The apartment also had great security. The Host and his team was very professional and on-call for any concerns. We would definitley stay here again.

This apartment was perfect. It looks exactly like the pictures and the view is even more stunning in person. The apartment is equipped with everything you need for a great stay and it is located in the best part of the city. You can walk to so many great restaurants and bars and also can access the entire city using nearby public transportation. The check in process was incredibly easy and Ralf was responsive to any request, including providing great recommendations for bars and restaurants in the area. Ralf’s associate handled the check in but Ralf also stopped by in person to make sure that my stay was going well. Overall it was a wonderful experience and I would recommend it to anyone traveling to Buenos Aires.

W H A T  A  V I E W!!!! Twenty floors up and you can see the city 180 degrees. 
We were greeted by Marcelo on arrival. He was amazing with explaining everything about the apartment and surrounding services. We had our photo taken at the security gate and everything was set. 
We discovered just around the corner from the apartment complex a wonderful laundry where you can drop off your cloths in the morning and pick them up in the afternoon already clean, dry and beautifully folded for $100peso for a huge bag. Amazing. 
The apartment is exactly the way you see it in the photos on Airbnb. Very well presented and a big bowl of fresh fruit and water available on arrival. 
The apartment was located centrally to the wonderful Palermo area, filled with wonderful coffee shops, restaurants and craft beer houses. 
One coffee shop in particular called 'Lattente' located near corner of Paraguay and Thames (approx 10 min walk from apartment) roast their own coffee beans and really care about their craft. They have basic breakfast items and Pastry treats. We went every morning :) 
We had 5 nights at the apartment and Ralf was helpful in replacing our towels after 3 days My wife enjoyed the gym upstairs and I loved relaxing on the wonderful balcony with the magic view and cool breeze. Wifi in the apartment was exceptional also. Recommend to anyone who may be visiting the city for any length of stay.

The apartment was perfect for our stay for a few nights in Buenos Aires.  Beautiful, clean, fantastic views and very comfortable! Ralf was quick to respond and Marcello provided many great tips and suggestions.  We absolutely loved our time in Buenos Aires and would stay here again!

Everything about this stay was fantastic. On arrival we were met by Marcelo who gave us a comprehensive walk through the apartment. Every detail possible had been thought of, they even supplied a card with the apartment to use the subway. The view is better than the photos and it feels like you have your own personal viewing platform looking over Buenos Aires. The location was perfect as well; near the subway, cafes, restaurants and only a 10 minute walk to the heart of Palmero Soho.

Amazing stay! The accommodations are even better than described. The apartment was very well located, beautifully decorated, clean, and the view from the balcony is beautiful. We were very well greeted by the host and from the moment we set foot in the apartment, we felt at home. Ralf and Marcelo were very responsive at all times and communication was seamless. Location is fantastic - close to many shops and restaurants in Palermo. I would highly recommend this place and stay here again next time I'm in the area!
Beutiful place, awesome location, great host
Well equipped, modern and safe apartment with fantastic view. Very precise explanations during check in. It was really kind to receive some fresh fruit at our arrival!

First of all, I was recommended to stay in the area Palermo Soho so I chose this place. The building was nice and very safe. They even went as far as taking our photo so that the doorman knew us during our stay. The area felt nice and very safe. There wasn't a whole lot going on during the day when we walked around but we enjoyed just taking it all in. We also could have missed some stuff since we weren't there very long. 
The apartment was GORGEOUS!! Other than choosing his place for the area, I definitely chose it for how beautifully it was decorated and organized. Not one detail was left behind. Everything was very thought out and very user friendly. We felt very much at home at Ralf's. 
Ralf was also amazing. Our bus was late and he was very accommodating to letting us in two hours after we originally told him. He greeted us when we arrived and went over every single detail to make sure we were comfortable. He explained the heat, after, tv controls, coffee, balcony doors, shower, water temp etc. He also left us fresh fruit, coffee and water which was very thoughtful! Lastly, he was able to store our bags after checkout which was a huge help for us since we weren't leaving until later that afternoon. I would absolutely recommend anyone visiting BA to stay here!!

(URL HIDDEN)

랄프의 하우스는 최고였습니다.
깨끗하고
최대한 고객을 위한 편의를 제공하려는 게 느껴졌습니다.
팔레르모소호에 위치하고 있으며
지하철 플라자이탈리아역까지는 남자걸음으로 5분 거리입니다.
더 자세한 내용이 궁금하다면
제 블로그에 와서 후기를 보실 수 있습니다.
(URL HIDDEN)

Ralf's house PERFECT!!
If you need more information, plz come to my blog~^^

The apartment is very nice and cozy, the view is amazing and the location is perfect. It looks exactly like the photos, and is well stocked with all of the necessary kitchen and bathroom items.  I definitely recommend this listing!

Ralf was very friendly and kind and helpful. He was there to greet us, as planned. The studio itself had many thoughtful amenities — fruit, nice music playing, umbrella, laundry bag, coffee and tea, many other things that made for a great stay. The view is nice and the gym in the building was exactly what I was hoping it would be.

Ralf is an excellent host who could not do enough for us and his advice was perfect for us. I would definitely recommend Ralf's apartment to anyone going to Buenos Aires. The apartment is clean, central and perfect to explore Buenos Aires.
A localizacao e a vista são o diferencial. O ap é bem decorado e descoladinho. O banheiro esta novo e tudo funciona como tem que funcionar.
A great apartment, very well located and with a breathtaking view over Buenos Aires!
A beautiful place and highly recommended.  It's in the wonderful neighborhood of Palermo, and has an amazing view of the city!

Gostaríamos de agradecer a hospitalidade nos últimos dias. O apartamento é realmente muito gostoso, a vista é incrível como nas fotos, e a localização é muito próxima ao centro de Palermo e metrô da cidade. Não tivemos problemas durante nossa hospedagem com relação ao apartamento, funcionalidades, limpeza, e etc. Apenas uma observação para quem é sensível a barulho e tem sono leve: aparentemente a divisão entre os apartamentos é bem fina, e quando a vizinha do apartamento de cima andava barulho na nossa unidade.
Obrigada pelo late checkout, conseguimos aproveitar um pouquinho mais a cidade!

Ralf's apartment was perfect. The views are amazing and the location is exactly where you want to be, and value can't be beat. Follow Ralf's suggestions on food. His three recommendations (all nearby restaurants and wine bars) were fantastic. Ralf was super helpful, held on to our bag when we travelled the country for a few days before coming back. 100% recommend and would love to come back and stay here.

This is a beautiful apartment in a safe, very walkable neighborhood. It's only two blocks from a main thoroughfare, with access to the metro, tons of shops and restaurants, and wonderful (and spotless) parks and open spaces. The apartment came equipped with everything we needed, including a subway card. We opted for the optional car service to and from the airport, which was well worth the extra cost. The airport is about 45 minutes away, and both of our flights were in the evening, so trying to arrange transportation on our own would have been daunting. Aside from some momentary confusion at check in, the only slight (and rather funny) hiccup occurred on our last day. We checked out at the regular time, but because our flight wasn't until that evening, the host stored our bags in his space until the car was ready to take us to the airport. Just before we were ready to collect our bags, the host accidentally locked the key to the apartment housing our bags, inside. We had to wait for one of his assistants to arrive with a spare key, which put us about 15 minutes behind. The driver must have known we were running late, because he drove very aggressively, like super aggressively, to the airport. Somehow we arrived in one piece, so no foul. Just a funny story to cap our wonderful stay in this beautiful apartment.

The apartment was beautiful, very clean, and had a lovely view of the city. The walls are a little thin - just something to be aware of if you are a very light sleeper (I am not but my boyfriend is, and you can sometimes hear people walking around on the floor above you). The neighborhood and location is a perfect base for exploring.

Der Aufenthalt hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Alles ist so wie auf den Bildern, nur die Aussicht ist in Wirklichkeit noch besser ;)
Man merkt, dass die Wohnung aufmerksam eingerichtet ist, so hat es bspw. im Badezimmer Shampoo und Duschbehälter, einen Make-up Sortierer und einen Föhn. Zur Begrüssung hatte es frische Früchte und Wasser bereits im Kühlschrank. 
Marcelo hat uns sehr ett empfangen und uns alles erklärt. Wir würden definitiv wieder kommen!
Apartamento bem localizado, com decoração, limpeza e conforto impecáveis. Recepção da equipe excelente. Obrigado por tudo.

We had a great time in Ralf's apartment. 
Location is great and the view is astonished. Very easy to communicate with Ralf. I highly recommend this apartment

My husband and I LOVED our stay in Buenos Aires and that was all thanks to Ralf and his amazing Airbnb. Ralf went above and beyond to help us feel right at home in the apartment as well as in the city itself. The apartment is amazing with nice details like fresh flowers, fruit, good art, and a balcony with an amazing view. Our flight out of Buenos Aires was cancelled due to a city-wide strike, and Ralf and Matias helped find us a (just as great) place to stay in the same building - Matias also drove to the airport to get our tickets and flight rescheduled. We travel a lot and have stayed at many Airbnbs and this is definitely in our top favorites. Thanks again Ralf and Matias :)

Apartment was just as described and pictured. Ralf was very flexible with check in and check out times which helped a lot. Apartment was nothing less than beautiful. The view you get of the city is amazing and I will definitely return to this apartment once I'm in Argentina again. Very clean!! Truly loved experiencing my first AirBnb with you! Thanks
Great location and view of the city!

My husband and I had a fantastic stay at Ralf's place. From reservation to check out, it was a seamless process. The apartment itself is beautiful, spotless and in a perfect location, in Palermo Soho and a couple short blocks from the Subte. The view from the apartment is oustanding. The apartment building is also secure and has a pool, sauna, gym and jacuzzi. The person who let us into the apartment (I believe Marcelo) was also kind, enthusiastic and had good recommendations. Everything you could want and more.  Would come back in a heartbeat.

The accommodation and location exceeded our expectations by far. 
The apartment was so comfortable and stylish that I would move there straight away! There were no facilities missing! It was a 4-5 star hotel comfort in that beautiful apartment! The team offered excellent service and provided the feeling to reach out to them anytime if requested! If ever I return to Buenos Aires, I will definitely stay there again!!

The location was just right, very centrally located with many restaurants nearby but at the same time very quiet in the apartment. Not to mention the stunning view, you can enjoy from any angle (including from the bed) of the apartment.
Staff was very kindly help to us. And room condition was perfact location also. We want to stay other Ralf's room if we trip Buenosaires.
Beautiful view, very clean and safe. Well equipped. I would like to come back soon!
Great place to stay. Very central. Ralf is very accessible and easy to communicate with. Amazing sunset and great pool!

The host (Ralf) greeted me upon arrival and took care of every detail.  The apartment is in a perfect location - a quiet street in a very central and convenient neighborhood.  The apartment is decorated VERY well and looks EXACTLY like the photos.  The view is stunning and I never got sick of waking up to it and watching the sunset from it. I would stay there again  in a heartbeat.

The apartment was exactly as pictured. Ralf was very helpful with our travel planning, booking an airport car service for us, and provided a great overview of the city and surrounding area upon check-in. The view was amazing, we spent a lot of time on the balcony.

Ralf was so receptive and atencious. He explained me patiently everything I needed to know about my stay there. The place is wonderful: big, has a great view and has  afantastic location too. My stay in Palermo Uno was perfect!
Ralf and his staff and everyone at the building is supper friendly and helpful, everything was great, this is the second time we stayed at one Ralf's apartment, and sure will do it again
Great place! Awesome view of city.  The apartment has great security so is very safe. Walking distance to restaurants, etc.
Wsr ein toller Aufenthalt in einer Wohnung mit allen Annehmlichkeiten. Hat unsere Erwartungen übertroffen.
Mooi appartement met leuk uitzicht. Locatie ook prima, dicht bij de metro en veel restaurants en winkels op loopafstand. Verder erg schoon en Ralf en zijn personeel zijn erg behulpzaam.
Top service. From the airport transfer to the check in, the apt was amazing and as advertised. Would highly recommend. Great area, great building and great host!

I had a great experience at Ralf's apartment! The apartment is very nice, the view is amazing and the location is perfect! The building is pretty much new and has 24/7 security and is very safe. The gym is pretty good and you can get some decent workouts! Ralf was a great host took his time to show me the nearest food markets and restaurants and even gave me a Subte (subway) card for my stay in Buenos Aires! Marcelo, a very nice guy who works with Ralf, arranged me a car service for my trip back to the airport and was very thoughtful and explanatory over the phone. This was one of the best places I ever stayed through Airbnb! Thank you so much Ralf and your entire team for having me! Muchas gracias a todos! Hasta luego!

This studio apartment was just perfect for our stay in BA.  It looks exactly like the photos and is well stocked with all of the necessary kitchen and bathroom items.  Ralf was super welcoming and gave us a great introduction to the apartment and BA.  Ralf was also extremely responsive when we had questions / concerns.  Great location, great value - I definitely recommend this listing!
Warm welcome and very hospitable. When there was a small problem it was fairly remedied. Would love to visit again!

Ralf's apartment is really nice. a beautiful view of Buenos Aires and the neighborhood is really cool. Ralf or Marcelo are really listening and kind, ready to advise us. I recommend highly the apartment.

The place is as advertised and I enjoyed my time stay there.  I interacted both with Ralf and Marcelo and both were great. I would not hesitate to recommend this apartment, which is quite nice and in an excellent location

What a great and easy experience. Ralf was quick with any questions that we had and even let us stay 8 hours past check out because the apartment was vacant after our stay. I cannot stress how helpful and wonderful the whole experience was. Also, the best location in BA with an amazing city view. We will definitely be returning.

This apartment is amazing!!!
We met with Ralph he ran through everything about the property and spent a lot of time with us which was great so we had a really good understanding of the apartment and also the city.
 I would certainly recommend this amazing apartment to future Airbnb guests the views are incredible the complex is amazing and the location is second to none close to amazing restaurants and bars.  It's safe and secure and we had a great time

Always love staying with Ralph in Palermo Uno! I feel right at home and have everything you could possibly need in an apartment. I would never rent from anyone else in Buenos Aires and this is coming from someone who has visited the city dozens of times and stayed just about everywhere. Thanks as always Ralph for being so accommodating.

Excellent view and facilities. Convenient location and a great building.
Ralf was also helpful with transportation. Thanks for having us, we had happy days in this flat.

This was the best place ever for my trip! 15 minutes walking from the heart of Palermo Soho (Plaza Armenia), and few minutes  from the most beautiful place ever (Paseo el Rosedal). We went to ALL the good places in Recoleta and Palermo for less than 75 pesos! It was the most awesome days ever! The location is perfect and the apartment is great! The kitchen, bed, everything! The view from the gym is PERFECT! Ralf's team gave us 2 easter eggs, such a lovely gift!!! Thanks Marcelo and all the team for everything!

The appartment is in one of the best areas of buenos aires with easy access to the subte (tube). The view is just incredible and the flat very convenient. The gym on the top gives another 360 view of the city which motivated us to exercise! Great experience overall, Marcelo warmly welcomed us, and by the 4th day it felt we were portenos ourselves!

Simply great experience with Ralf and the team. Is was very akin to staying in a 5* hotel. Ralf arranged a pick up for us from the airport which worked smoothly. Ralf was there to give us a great welcome, not only covering the apartment but also a great intro to Buenos Aries and some fantastic bar and restaurant selections. Also got us a great deal on our Tango Night. The apartment is simply top notch, 20th floor with fantastic views, good quality fittings, bedding, etc etc. Impossible to fault. The "office " was also there to help with laundry, taxis etc, all in all the best Airbnb Experience we have had.

Our stay at Ralf's place in BA was the best we've experienced so far, in South America.  His staff is extremely prompt, knowledgeable, and responsive.  The location was everythin we expected it to be - very comfortable, great views, and an awesome location.  We walked all over Palermo from the apartment, and the easy access to the D line put the city at our fingertips.  Highly recommended!

The Palermo studio was the perfect location for my husband and I to make our home base while we explored Buenos Aires. It is exactly as pictured. We were greeted warmly and provided with a lot of useful information for our stay. We loved the terrace, had breakfast every morning there and also watched the sunset. The pool was amazing. We would stay again and recommend this place to others!
Our stay was great and everything went smoothly. The location was perfect for exploring Palermo on foot. I would recommend for anyone coming to stay

Absolutely amazing apartment. Clean, comfortable, nice neighborhood, and probably the best views in all of Buenos Aires. Some of the most incredible sunsets I've seen- ever! Ralf was very helpful and professional, really appreciate him coordinating around our travel arrangements. Would definitely stay again!

I travelled with my daughter of 13 and had an excellent stay at Palermo Uno. We've spent a lot of time in Buenos Aires and we stayed both in hotels and apartments and this apartment is by far the best we ever stayed in. We booked transfer from the airport since its a caos at the airport and we were recived by Marcelo at the apartment who explained everything to us. The place is exactly as it looks like in the pictures, but the sunset is even more amazing than in pictures, it's really breathtaking, we couldn't get enough of it! The apartment is very well equipped and has for example towels to use by the pool, a coffee machine, olive oil and balsamic vinager, teabags, mate cocido, kitchen towel and cleanings stuff, things you don't always find at rental apartments. 
We loved the pool that we used every day and also the gym that we used several times, the view makes it a lot easier to work out! 
Palermo soho is our favorite area in Buenos Aires, it's close to all the nice shops and restaurants and to Bosques de Palermo were ALL porteños are running and exercising. Also very close to metro and all important buslines, taxi is cheap and you easily get one from the street. Highly recommend this amazing apartment!

This sunset luxury apartment was perfect for us during our week in Buenos Aires. Perfect location in fancy palermo, a very nice view from the balcony (which we used a lot), nice poolarea, comfortable bed and bathroom. We felt secure and taken care of. I would recomend this place to everyone!

Pre stay communication was friendly and efficient. We arrived quite early, but Ralf let us into the apartment way ahead of the check-in time. We got very useful tips for money exchange and restaurants in the area. The apartment is just perfect to explore the bustle of Palermo and conveniently close to the Subte to venture into the city. A great experience...

Excelente apartamento, exatamente como nas fotos. Anfitrião solícito e muito simpático. Localização excelente, perto de vários restaurantes, cafés e mercados. Próximo também do Metrô e dos Parques de Palermo.  Ficarei no mesmo local, numa futura vinda a Buenos Aires.

Ralf's studio was amazing, it had everything I needed, including a warm welcome by one of his staff members with free fruit, water, and coffee.  They provided me with the option to use their airport pick-up service also which made it convenient after a long flight.  His studio was clean and has a great view of the city.  The studio is located only two short blocks from the subway and the neigborhood itself felt very safe and they have grocery stores nearby in case you want to eat at home.  I do appreciate Ralf staff team with providing me a city map and suggestions on what to do. They also have a universal international plug surcharger which came in handy to charge my phone.  I really like that they had a gym onsite and laundry option and a pool.  You are in a gated(with security guard) high rise building which makes you feel extra safe as well.  The bed is queen size and it felt nice and cozy along with the A/C unit.  Cable with direct TV is also available.  They were aslo very nice to allow me to check in early and do a late check out(Thank You).

I would highly recommend anyone to stay at his place and I would definitley love to stay here again on my next visit.

This was a top-notch apartment in one of the best buildings in Buenos Aires. The views were amazing (especially from the top-floor gym!) and the apartment was clean and quiet. I would definitely return again! The host also did an excellent job of showing the ammenities and making sure everything would go smoothly.

Ralf and his team have been amazing!  We booked our stay well in advance of our trip to Buenos Aires. They were well prepared from the the first interactions. Great communication and timely responses! 

Andres and Marcelo were our main contracts.  Andres, who helped via email prior to arrival secure a driver from international airport to the apartment for check-in. The driver mainly spoke Spanish but was kind and safe.  

When we arrived, Marcelo was waiting for us at the apartment. Marcelo, took the time to show us all the nice features of the apartment, as well as a map with points of interest marked off.

The apartment look just like the photos!  It's a really great, clean, light filled apartment.  The building has 5 elevators, two security guards on duty at all times, and it's very conveniently located.

We also scheduled a driver to bring us to the domestic airport. At check out Marcelo met us. We had made plans to leave our bags with Marcelo in a secure location before we met the driver becuase we were going to have time between check out and going to the airport.  However, our plane was early. Andres over email helped get the driver sooner than expected!

Ralf and his team are full service. It's a great apartment in a fabulous lication.  Definitely advise others to stay with Ralf!

With an exceptional view the location is perfect to explore Palermo and the subway is a quick convenient few minutes walk. A couple of blocks walk on the same street is a good inexpensive local restaurant called La Lechuza the address is 1980 Uriarte. The pre-arranged airport transfer worked very well I would recommend it.

The hosts were great!  Very polite and helpful - they got me on the right track since it was my first time in BA.  The APT is nice; basically what you see - the bed was very comfy!  If you're used to big city US 'high end' apartments, though, it wasn't quite up to par, but I don't think that's this apartment specifically - just a difference in construction between the Americas.  Still a great deal for what you pay.

This apartment was great - amazing view and convenient location.  The host was very knowledgeable and helpful.  He had maps and guidebooks waiting for us as well as coffee and fruit.  We had a great stay!

L'appartamento era molto bello e funzionale, esattamente come nella descrizione e nelle foto dell'annuncio. E' situato nel quartiere Palermo, una zona molto tranquilla e piena di ristoranti e negozi. In pochi minuti in metropolitana puoi raggiungere il microcentro. Dal ventesimo piano dell'appartamento si gode di una vista magnifica. La società di Ralf, che gestisce diversi appartamenti in zona, è molto seria e professionale. Ad accoglierci è stato Marcelo, che è stato molto gentile a darci informazioni utili per vivere al meglio la splendida Buenos Aires. Disponibile è presente per ogni tipo di problema. Una persona davvero eccezionale. Sicuramente torneremo in Argentina e certamente ritorneremo in uno degli appartamenti della società di Ralf. Grazie di tutto

well located and very safe place to be in bs. the view is amazing!!! gym in the 31 floor is included and also spa area on 32 floor wich is a nice benefit to this appartment. next stay will be definitly with this hosts again.

Ralf and Marcelo were both very welcoming, helpful, and responsive to our questions while visiting BA for our first time. The apartment was perfect with a great view and a balcony to enjoy sunset from. The location was awesome. Only two blocks from the subway station (very easy and convenient to use - did not realize what a resource that would be) and a short stroll to the bars and restaurants in Palermo SoHo. Ralf's book of recommendations was helpful and the complimentary fruit was a nice touch. This was our first AirBnB experience and it was awesome. I would love to come back to BA and stay here again!

We used Ralf's arranged car service from EZE (much less stressful than all the other options available) and were taken straight to the apartment.  Marcelo gave us a thorough rundown of all the apt features and of Buenos Aires (with a map for us to keep even).  We probably kept him for an entire hour just asking questions about Argentina and BsAs, and he was so helpful in getting us oriented.  The apartment is very nice, and the team leaves you with a basket of fresh fruit (perfect for breakfast on the patio).  The view and amenities were wonderful!

Beautiful apartment with a gorgeous view of the city. We loved getting some wine and cheese and relaxing on the balcony in the evening. We dealt with Andres and he was super friendly and helpful. He let us know where everything we needed was in the area and gave us a map. The location was perfect for us. Only a 5 minute walk to the subway which will get you everywhere you need to go around Buenos Aires. The apartment itself was very close to quite a few nice restaurants. I recommend Don Julio for the best steak you'll have in your life! We had an issue with the toilet blocking up on our 3rd day and they quickly resolved the issue while we were out exploring the city. Very efficient! I highly recommend this apartment. The neighbourhood is nice and we felt completely safe walking around into the early hours of the morning.
The apartment was very nice and comfortable. We loved the view and the heated floor. The bed and linen were a delight.
Great location, very professional service, everything corresponds to the photos. We had a lovely weekend with our 18 months baby boy.

The apartment was really great, the neighbourhood of Palermo is perfect to find restaurants, milongas, parties at night, and yet it is very quiet, close to big parks very well adapted to run. 
And Ralf was very helpful, very professional, all the good advices were written in a booklet !

This apartment was absolutley perfect for our trip! It was clean, comfortable and came with a view that took our breath away. We were welcomed at the apartment by Andres after a delayed flight and late arrival which we very much appreciated! He was able to walk us through everything we needed to know about the unit and all things Buenos Aires. The building is in a great location in Palermo Soho, so we were able to walk to many places or jump on the green line of the Sube to get to everywhere we wanted to go. We also felt safe in the buidling with the security features. I would highly recommend staying here if you are traveling to Buenos Aires.
Ralf nos recebeu muito bem, super pontual, ajudou nas localizações básicas.
